key.name: interval
key.description: The number of minutes friends-service will wait in between attempts at downloading new messages.

key.name: notifications
key.summary: What kind of notifications should we display?
key.description: Possible values are "all" for all notifications (warning: you will get spammed with a lot of notifications), "mentions-only" which will only notify you of messages that are addressed specifically to you, or "none", which hides all notifications.

key.name: debug
key.description: Whether or not to show verbose debugging messages in the logfile.

key.name: shorten-urls
key.description: Whether or not to automatically shorten URLs in messages that we send out to the world.

key.name: urlshorter
key.description: Choose the preferred URL shortening service.
